title: The Young volunteers
creator_credit: Peter Whale and Overseas Film & Television Centre
brief_description: British Voluntary Service Overseas: shows orientation process for volunteers at a South London Teachers College. Includes scenes of volunteers in Mauritus, Lima (Peru), Korea, Malaysia, Kuala Lumpur, Tanzania.
